name: BonBon Never Goes Right
description:
Move your Bonbon right with the help of clickable blocks in the scene. Beware of hidden blocks in the level, and try not to go left.

Controls:

R key is to restart the level

Use your mouse and left click objects in the scene to help you

Press ******** to ******** 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here are some things that will help you while playing the level. 

Be sure to sing them to yourself :D

I want to complete Bonbon
Like no student ever did
To finish this is my real test
To not to quit is my cause!
I will travel across the levels,
Climbing very high.
To each Bonbon to understand
The sanity inside
Bonbon
Gotta keep your sanity
It's you and me 
I know its my sanity
Bonbon!
Going left if my best friend
In a game we must complete
Bonbon
Gotta Keep your sanity 
A game so cruel
You teach me and I fail you 
Bonbon
Gotta keep your sanity
Gotta keep your sanity
Gotta keep your sanity
Gotta keep your sanity
Gotta keep your sanity
Bonbon
Gotta keep your sanity
It's you and me
Gotta keep your sanity
Bonbon
I fail you and you fail
Through Levels we will fail
Bonbon
Gotta keep your sanity
In a game thats so unfair
I fail you and you fail me 
Bonbon
Never Goes Right
Never Goes Right
BonBon Never Goes Right

We also have this
 I'd like to call this little number "Climbing Walls"

The best time to scale a steeped wall
Is all the time

One little click over another
What a Wide

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So if you made it this far down you either 

1. Rage quit 

2. Needed some inspirational quotes

So we decided to go over the world to get you the help

Here are your quotes/comments from real people:

I was in enough to get along with people. I was never socially inarticulate. Not a loner. And that saved my life, saved my sanity. That and the writing. But to this day I distrust anybody who thought this game was a good a idea. 

~Stephen King

I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity. This game is one of those intervals. 

~Edgar Allan Poe

Great kid, don't get cocky! 

~Han Solo

When you are talking about, 'I will lose my sanity for real,' that's when it's time to move on but you can't because there's no return to main menu screen.

~Travis Kalanick

I had a quick grasp of the secret to sanity, it had become the ability to hold the maximum of impossible combinations in one's mind but Bonbon kept going left so that secret is long gone! 

~ Norman Mailer

What are you still doing reading this go play the game

~ James G, Ken V, Sean P
